title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 27
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 27:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Allen & Gale - Understanding Financial Crises (2007)

-  Ayadi & Arbak - Financial Centres in Europe; a New Positioning in the Global Financial Market Post-crisis (2014)

-  Bovens et al (Eds.) - The Real World of EU Accountability; What Deficit (2010)

-  Calciano et  al (Eds.) - The Restructuring of Banks and Financial Systems in the Euro Area and the Financing of SMEs (2015)

-  Cencini & Rossi - Economic and Financial Crises; a New Macroeconomic Analysis (2015)

-  Chinn & Frieden - Lost Decades; the Making of America's Debt Crisis and the Long Recovery (2011)

-  Chui - Private Sector Involvement and International Financial Crises (2005)

-  Cooper - The Origin of Financial Crises (2008)

-  Dickstein - Dancing in the Dark; a Cultural History of the Great Depression (2009)

-  Eecke - Ethical Reflections on the Financial Crisis, 2007-2008, Making Use of Smith, Musgrave and Rajan (2013)

-  Faber - Global Value; How to Spot Bubbles, Avoid Market Crashes, and Earn Big Returns in the Stock Market (2014)

-  Grossman - Wrong; Nine Economic Policy Disasters and What We Can Learn from Them (2013)

-  Horn - Working Scared, or Not at All; the Lost Decade, Great Recession, and Restoring the Shattered American Dream (2014)

-  Horvat - Return to Order; Where We've Been, How We Got Here, and Where We Need to Go (2013)

-  Jao - The Asian Financial Crisis and The Ordeal of Hong Kong (2001)

-  Jones - Can the Market Speak (2013)

-  Jorion - Investing in a Post-Enron World (2003)

-  Kaplan - F'D Companies; Spectacular Dot-Com Flameouts (2002)

-  Lane - A Nation Wholly Free; the Elimination of the National Debt in the Age of Jackson (2014)

-  Lienau - Rethinking Sovereign Debt; Politics, Reputation, and Legitimacy (2014)

-  Manzi - Uncontrolled; the Surprising Payoff of Trial-and-Error for Business, Politics, and Society (2012)

-  Mason - From Buildings and Loans to Bail-Outs; a History of the American Savings and Loan Industry, 1831-1995 (2004)

-  Monks - Uninvested; How Wall Street Hijacks Your Money & How to Fight Back (2015)

-  Morgan & Sturdy - Beyond Organizational Change; Structure, Discourse and Power in UK Financial Services (2000)

-  Navarro & Muntaner (Eds.) - The Financial and Economic Crises and Their Impact on Health and Social Well-Being (2014)

-  Pasco - Criminal Financial Investigations; the Use of Forensic Accounting Techniques and Indirect Methods of Proof, 2e (2013)

-  Poloucek (Ed.) - Reforming the Financial Sector in Central European Countries (2004)

-  Porter (Ed.) - Broke; How Debt Bankrupts the Middle Class (2012)

-  Shiller - The New Financial Order; Risk in the 21st Century (2003)

-  Shrivastava & Statler (Eds.) - Learning from the Global Financial Crisis; Creatively, Reliably, and Sustainably (2012)

-  Skeel - Debt's Dominion; a History of Bankruptcy Law in America (2001)

-  Skidelsky & Skidelsky (Eds.) - Are Markets Moral (2015)

-  Starke et al - The Welfare State as Crisis Manager; Explaining the Diversity of Policy Responses to Economic Crisis (2013)

-  Temin & Vines - The Leaderless Economy; Why the World Economic System Fell Apart and How to Fix It (2013)

-  Weil - Financial Infidelity; Seven Steps to Conquering the #1 Relationship Wrecker (2008)
